Literature.Title: Exploring the repository of de novo designed bifunctional antimicrobial peptides through deep learning
Literature.Author: Dong R, Liu R, Liu Z, Liu Y, Zhao G, Li H, Hou S, Ma X, Kang H, Liu J, Guo F, Zhao P, Wang J, Wang C, Wu X, Ye S, Zhu C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=25 µM,Vero E6 cells:50% Cytotoxicity=>30 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=0.20µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=0.40µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=3.18µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=3.18µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.80µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=0.80µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=1.59µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=1.59µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma Huh7(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>30µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>30µM),Chikungunya virus (CHIKV)(EC50=1.62-2.67µM),Hantaan virus (HTNV)(EC50=1.62-2.67µM),HSV-1(EC50=1.62-2.67µM)
